amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement section 10011(b) of Public Law 111-11, regarding the restoration of the San Joaquin River and the reintroduction of the California Central Valley Spring Run Chinook salmon.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement section 10011(b) of Public Law 111-11, regarding the restoration of the San Joaquin River and the reintroduction of the California Central Valley Spring Run Chinook salmon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
